title: Adobe Premiere Pro: A Complete Guide
headline: Learn how to use Adobe Premiere Pro to create and edit digital art and videos like a pro in this free online course.
description: Did you know that home video technology didn't exist before the mid-1990s? The field has since gained much popularity and video skills are in high demand. This Adobe Premiere Pro tutorial explains how to use this respected video editing software to create new projects, edit existing ones and export your work. We show you how to use the program’s tools to create your own digital art masterpieces. Sign up to learn how to edit videos like a pro.
courseDescription:
The Covid-19 pandemic has fueled an already insatiable global appetite for video content. According to a recent study, the average American now has four different streaming video subscriptions. The demand for video editors skilled in video production is clearly skyrocketing. This Adobe Premiere Pro tutorial provides the skills required to create and edit video masterpieces.

We begin with an overview of the capabilities and tools offered by Adobe Premiere Pro before outlining its history and various upgrades. We then go through the Premiere Pro interface and examine its various panels, timelines and workspaces. The course explains how to arrange panels and workspaces and organise the basic workflow of a project.

The ability to manage assets when using any software is an art. We help you master this skill and apply it to Premiere Pro. We define ‘aspect ratio’ before delving into the editing of sequences and clips. The course teaches you how to use audio in your videos. Finally, we demonstrate how to add beautiful text and filters to your work. This course has no prerequisites and suits graphic design professionals or anyone looking to learn a valuable new skill. Sign up to learn how to edit videos with Adobe Premiere Pro and take your place in the Digital Age.
